scripts.dist: cat data.js index.js > index.tmp.js; browserify index.tmp.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] | uglifyjs > build/immersenet.min.js; index.tmp.js
scripts.build: cat data.js index.js > index.tmp.js; browserify index.tmp.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] > build/immersenet.js; index.tmp.js
scripts.build-userdata: cat index.js > index.tmp.js; browserify index.tmp.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] > build/immersenet.userdata.js; rm index.tmp.js
